text: Günther Maleuda (20 January 1931 – 18 July 2012) was an East German politician. From 1989 to 1990 he was the President of the People's Chamber (East German Parliament). In 1994 he was elected as a (non-party) member of the Bundestag (German Parliament) on the PDS list. He stayed a member until 1998. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Members of the Volkskammer
title: Günther Maleuda
